Package fr.iutvalence.info.projet.s2.g17.photop

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Main
    The main of the application
    Photop
    Photop' is a photo editing software Features : open an image create an image save an image transform an image add shapes add text add embellishment add a frame draw
    PhotopImage
    Represents an image : an image has a name, an extension, an url and is saved or not
    PhotopObject
    Represents an Object, an Object can be an image or a decoration an Object has got a specific position and a specific dimension
    PhotopShape
    A photopShape has a color, a type (square, circle...), a position and a dimension
    Pointer
    Represents the the pointer used to draw a PhotopShape on a DrawPanel A pointer has a color, a type and a size
    Position
    Represents a position of an object
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    TypeShape
    The enum of the different type of a PhotopShape
